metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2395 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in action_power.py in Cobbler 2.2.0allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shellmetacharacters in the (1) username or (2) password fields to thepower_system method in the xmlrpc API.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2395` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cobbler - 2.4.1-0ubuntu2
cobbler-common - 2.4.1-0ubuntu2
cobbler-web - 2.4.1-0ubuntu2
koan - 2.4.1-0ubuntu2
python-cobbler - 2.4.1-0ubuntu2
python-koan - 2.4.1-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cobbler package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.1-0ubuntu2').
